entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts who is expected to make a speech at the end-of-term feast.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: A dark wizard whose return was mentioned by Dumbledore last year.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist who is worried about Dumbledore's speech and finds a mysterious package in his trunk.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather who gave him the mysterious package with a note.

relationships.description: Harry is worried that Dumbledore will make some reference to him in his speech.
Dumbledore mentioned Voldemort's return last year.
Sirius gave Harry the mysterious package with a note.
The note from Sirius says 'Use it if you need me'.
